original_text: I did not say that I was an important man. Instead, I worked as a servant of the Lord Jesus. I often was sad because of trouble that came to me. Some Jewish people spoke against my message. They wanted to hurt me.
korean_text: 곧 모든 겸손과 눈물이며 유대인의 간계로 말미암아 당한 시험을 참고 주를 섬긴 것과

sentences.original_text: I did not say that I was an important man.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내가 중요한 사람이라고 말하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, I worked as a servant of the Lord Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 나는 주 예수님의 종으로 일했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I often was sad because of trouble that came to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내게 닥친 고난 때문에 자주 슬펐습니다.

sentences.original_text: Some Jewish people spoke against my message.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 유대인들은 나의 메시지를 반대하여 말했습니다.
